title: To all dear Friends & brethren in the everlasting truth & covenant of the Almighty Jehovah, blessed for evermore
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
notes: Dated and signed: Newgate prison, the 12th of the 4th month 1662. E.B., J.C., J.P.
"The cogitations of my heart have been many, deep, and ponderous ...", p. 7-8, signed: Fran. Howgill.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
